question: 強制
partsOfSpeech: noun, transitive, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: They have <kanji>strong</kanji> <kanji>control</kanji> over us. That's why they can make us do all this <vocabulary>compulsory</vocabulary> stuff. We have to do it. They're too strong!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
